### Chęciny, Poland - 2023

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-6}

![](images/poland.jpg)

Delegate group photo - 14^th^ International Symposium Fossil Coral and Reef Society, 10--16 September 2023, European Centre for Geological Education, Poland. Photographs from Poland are [available here ](https://fossilcoralreefs.com/?page_id=131).

:::

![](images/brian.jpg)

Brian Rosen awarded with the Henri Milne Edwards Medal for his major contributions on the study of fossil corals - September 2023, European Centre for Geological Education, Poland.
